main.mode_home: [模式] 預設首頁推薦內容
main.scroll_depth: [設定] 爬取深度 (滾動次數): {count}
main.cleanup_threshold: [上傳設定] 清理閾值: {threshold} GB
main.upload_limit: [上傳設定] 本次上傳數量上限: {limit}
main.db_info: [DB] 資料庫中已存在 {videos} 筆影片紀錄，{likes} 筆按讚紀錄。
main.no_new_videos: 未抓取到任何符合下載條件的新影片。
main.scraping_complete: 篩選完成，共 {count} 個影片待下載
main.processing_video: 正在處理影片 ID: {video_id}, 作者: {author}, 內容: {caption}...
main.download_failed: 影片 {video_id} 下載失敗，跳過紀錄。
main.db_write_failed: 寫入資料庫失敗: {error}，中止執行。
main.total_downloaded: 本次共下載了 {count} 個新影片
main.starting_uploader: --- 所有下載任務已完成，即將啟動上傳器... ---
main.uploader_import_error: [錯誤] 無法匯入 uploader.py 模組。
main.upload_param_warning: 錯誤：參數 '-n' 或 '-du' 必須與 '-u' (自動上傳) 參數一起使用。請修正您的指令。

scraper.no_cookie: 錯誤：請在 .env 檔案中設定 THREADS_SESSION_COOKIE。
scraper.scraper_start: 正在啟動爬蟲 (V5 API 模擬引擎)...
scraper.validating_cookie: 正在驗證 Cookie 有效性...
scraper.cookie_invalid: Cookie 已失效或無效，請更新您的 .env 檔案中的 THREADS_SESSION_COOKIE。
scraper.cookie_valid: Cookie 驗證成功，帳號已登入。
scraper.like_token_failed: 無法獲取按讚權杖，按讚功能將被停用。
scraper.max_scroll_reached: 已達到最大滾動次數上限，停止滾動。
scraper.analysis_start: --- 分析開始：解析所有捕獲的 GraphQL 數據包 ---
scraper.no_graphql_requests: 未能捕獲到任何包含貼文數據的 GraphQL API 請求。
scraper.packet_error: 處理數據包時發生錯誤: {error}
scraper.no_posts_parsed: 警告：未能從 API 回應中解析出任何貼文。目標頁面可能沒有內容，或 API 結構已變更。
scraper.parsing_posts: 解析到 {count} 個總貼文項目。開始根據門檻進行互動與篩選...
scraper.liking_post: [互動] 貼文 {post_id} 讚數 ({like_count}) 已達門檻 ({threshold})，準備呼叫 API 按讚...
scraper.post_already_liked: [互動] 貼文 {post_id} 已存在於按讚紀錄中，跳過。
scraper.collecting_videos: [篩選] Post ID: {post_id} 讚數 ({like_count}) 已達下載門檻 ({threshold})，蒐集影片中...
scraper.video_added_to_list: [+] 已將影片加入待下載清單: {video_id}
scraper.continuous_mode_continue: 目前蒐集到 {count}/5 個影片，繼續滾動...
scraper.session_end: 爬取會話結束，瀏覽器將由上下文管理器自動關閉。
scraper.total_videos_scraped: 本次運行共篩選出 {count} 個符合條件的影片。

uploader.folder_size_check: '{folder}' 資料夾目前大小: {size:.2f} GB。清理閾值為: {threshold} GB。
uploader.cleanup_triggered: 資料夾大小已超過閾值。觸發已上傳檔案的清理程序...
uploader.cleanup_not_needed: 資料夾大小在限制範圍內，無需清理。
uploader.no_videos_to_upload: 資料庫中沒有新的影片需要上傳。
uploader.upload_limit_info: 根據 --num_videos 參數，本次最多上傳 {count} 部影片。
uploader.videos_found: 發現 {count} 部影片待上傳。
uploader.video_file_not_found: 跳過影片 ID {video_id}，因為檔案不存在: {path}
uploader.processing_video: --- 正在處理第 {current}/{total} 部影片: {filename} ---
uploader.metadata_gen_failed: 因元數據生成失敗，跳過影片 '{video_id}'。
uploader.db_update_failed: 致命錯誤: 更新影片 {video_id} 的資料庫狀態失敗: {error}
uploader.upload_failed: 影片 '{video_id}' 上傳失敗。中止本次上傳任務。
uploader.cleanup_start: 開始清理已上傳的檔案...
uploader.cleanup_no_files: 資料庫中沒有已上傳的影片可供清理。
uploader.cleanup_deleted_meta: 已刪除對應的元數據檔案: {path}
uploader.cleanup_delete_error: 刪除檔案 {path} 時發生錯誤: {error}
uploader.cleanup_done: 清理完畢。共刪除了 {count} 個影片檔案。

main.upload_limit: [Upload Config] Upload limit for this run: {limit}
main.db_info: [DB] Found {videos} video records and {likes} liked post records in the database.
main.no_new_videos: No new videos found matching the download criteria.
main.download_failed: Failed to download video {video_id}, skipping record.
main.db_write_failed: Failed to write to database: {error}, aborting execution.
main.total_downloaded: Downloaded {count} new videos in this session.
main.starting_uploader: --- All download tasks are complete, starting uploader... ---
main.upload_param_warning: ERROR: Parameters '-n' or '-du' must be used with the '-u' (auto-upload) parameter. Please correct your command.

scraper.cleanup_failed: [Scraper] Failed to delete old temporary file: {error}
scraper.no_cookie: Error: THREADS_SESSION_COOKIE is not set in the .env file.
scraper.cookie_invalid: Cookie has expired or is invalid. Please update THREADS_SESSION_COOKIE in your .env file.
scraper.cookie_valid: Cookie validation successful, account is logged in.
scraper.like_token_failed: Failed to get like tokens, like functionality will be disabled.
scraper.max_scroll_reached: Maximum scroll limit reached, stopping scroll.
scraper.analysis_start: --- Analysis start: Parsing all captured GraphQL data packets ---
scraper.no_graphql_requests: Failed to capture any GraphQL API requests containing post data.
scraper.no_posts_parsed: Warning: Failed to parse any posts from the API response. The target page may have no content, or the API structure may have changed.
scraper.parsing_posts: Parsed {count} total post items. Starting interaction and filtering based on thresholds...
scraper.liking_post: [Interaction] Post {post_id} like count ({like_count}) has reached the threshold ({threshold}), preparing to call like API...
scraper.post_already_liked: [Interaction] Post {post_id} is already in the liked records, skipping.
scraper.collecting_videos: [Filter] Post ID: {post_id} like count ({like_count}) has reached the download threshold ({threshold}), collecting videos...
scraper.continuous_mode_continue: Collected {count}/5 videos so far, continuing to scroll...
scraper.session_end: Scraping session ended, browser will be closed automatically by the context manager.
scraper.total_videos_scraped: A total of {count} videos matching the criteria were filtered in this run.

uploader.folder_size_check: Folder '{folder}' current size: {size:.2f} GB. Cleanup threshold: {threshold} GB.
uploader.cleanup_triggered: Folder size exceeds threshold. Triggering cleanup of uploaded files...
uploader.cleanup_not_needed: Folder size is within limits, no cleanup needed.
uploader.no_videos_to_upload: No new videos to upload in the database.
uploader.upload_limit_info: Based on the --num_videos parameter, uploading a maximum of {count} videos this run.
uploader.video_file_not_found: Skipping video ID {video_id} because the file does not exist: {path}
uploader.metadata_gen_failed: Skipping video '{video_id}' due to metadata generation failure.
uploader.db_update_failed: CRITICAL ERROR: Failed to update database status for video {video_id}: {error}
uploader.upload_failed: Upload failed for video '{video_id}'. Aborting this upload task.
uploader.cleanup_no_files: No uploaded videos found in the database to clean up.
uploader.cleanup_done: Cleanup finished. Deleted {count} video files in total.
